snippet: Health-care companies led the major indexes to slight gains, with the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index closing 0.4 percent higher.
abstract: Improved corporate earnings nudge stock market up.
lead_paragraph: Health-care companies led the major indexes to slight gains, with the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index closing 0.4 percent higher.

headline.main: Market Inches Up on Improved Corporate Earnings
headline.print_headline: Market Inches Up on Improved Corporate Earnings
